name: yui

scripts.postbuild: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && yarn run copy
scripts.copy: yarn run copy:client && yarn run copy:server
scripts.copy:client: cp -R app/static/. dist/client && cp -R app/.nuxt/dist/client dist/client/assets
scripts.copy:server: cp -R functions dist/server && cp -R app/.nuxt/ dist/server/lib/

description: Personal blog software on Google Firebase.
author: Mikazuki <mikazuki_fuyuno@outlook.com>
